org.jvnet.inflector

Interface Pluralizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NounPluralizer, NounPluralizer, RuleBasedPluralizer

    public interface Pluralizer

    Pluralizer converts singular word forms to their plural forms. Methods that are passed null must throw a NullPointerException.

    Implementations of this interface must be safe for use by multiple concurrent threads.

    Author:
    Tom White

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String pluralize(String word)
      Converts a word to its plural form.
      String pluralize(String word, int number)
      Converts a word to its plural form for the given number of instances.

    • Method Detail

      • pluralize

        String pluralize(String word)

        Converts a word to its plural form.

        The return value is not defined if this method is passed a plural form.

        Parameters:
        word - a singular form
        Returns:
        the plural form

      • pluralize

        String pluralize(String word,
               int number)

        Converts a word to its plural form for the given number of instances. Some languages (such as Polish) have different plural forms depending on the number of things being referred to.

        The return value is not defined if this method is passed a plural form.

        Parameters:
        word - a singular form
        number - the number of objects being referred to in the plural
        Returns:
        the plural form
